content: Hi Suraj! It's nice to meet you. How can I help you today?

That's a very important and in-demand role in today's data-driven world!

What kind of data engineering work do you typically focus on, or are there any interesting projects you're working on these days?
tell me one skill that I need to learn in 2026. just give a one line answer
what is my name and my role ?
Your name is Suraj and your role is Data Engineer.
